meanings.definition: Forming or expressing a general idea or conclusion.
meanings.sent1: The summative report provided a brief overview of the project.
meanings.sent2: Her summative statement captured the main point of the discussion.
meanings.sent3: The summative analysis helped us see the big picture clearly.
meanings.sent4: His summative remarks painted a clear picture of the situation.
meanings.sent5: The summative description made it easy to understand the main idea.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to or involving a final assessment or evaluation.
meanings.sent1: The summative test at the end of the semester was challenging.
meanings.sent2: Her summative grade reflected her overall performance in the class.
meanings.sent3: The summative evaluation determined the final outcome of the project.
meanings.sent4: His summative assessment highlighted areas for improvement.
meanings.sent5: The summative exam was the last step before graduation.

meanings.definition: Serving to summarize or give a final overview.
meanings.sent1: The summative presentation wrapped up the key points of the meeting.
meanings.sent2: Her summative conclusion brought together all the main ideas.
meanings.sent3: The summative summary made everyone laugh with its simplicity.
meanings.sent4: His summative overview left a lasting impression on the audience.
meanings.sent5: The summative recap made it easy to remember the main points.
